long_desc.thetext:
Latest upstream release: 2013.60
Current version/release in Fedora Rawhide: 2013.59-1.fc21
URL: https://matt.ucc.asn.au/dropbear/

Please consult the package updates policy before you issue an update to a stable branch: https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Updates_Policy

More information about the service that created this bug can be found at:
https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Upstream_release_monitoring

I won't push an update of 2013.60 as this version only contains configure/makefile fixes which doon't affect Fedora, quoted changelog:

-----------

2013.60 - Wednesday 16 October 2013

- Fix "make install" so that it doesn't always install to /bin and /sbin

- Fix "make install MULTI=1", installing manpages failed

- Fix "make install" when scp is included since it has no manpage

- Make --disable-bundled-libtom work

------------

I will push updates from 2013.61.
*** Bug 1037990 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

dropbear-2013.62-1.fc20 has been submitted as an update for Fedora 20.
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/dropbear-2013.62-1.fc20

dropbear-2013.62-1.el6 has been submitted as an update for Fedora EPEL 6.
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/dropbear-2013.62-1.el6

dropbear-2013.62-1.fc19 has been submitted as an update for Fedora 19.
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/dropbear-2013.62-1.fc19

dropbear-2013.62-1.fc18 has been submitted as an update for Fedora 18.
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/dropbear-2013.62-1.fc18

dropbear-2013.62-2.el6 has been submitted as an update for Fedora EPEL 6.
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/dropbear-2013.62-2.el6
dropbear-2013.62-2.el6 has been pushed to the Fedora EPEL 6 stable repository.  If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
dropbear-2013.62-1.fc20 has been pushed to the Fedora 20 stable repository.  If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
dropbear-2013.62-1.fc19 has been pushed to the Fedora 19 stable repository.  If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
dropbear-2013.62-1.fc18 has been pushed to the Fedora 18 stable repository.  If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.

comments.text: This update has been submitted for testing by cicku.
This update is currently being pushed to the Fedora EPEL 6 testing updates repository.
This update has been pushed to testing
This update has been submitted for stable by cicku.
This update is currently being pushed to the Fedora EPEL 6 stable updates repository.
This update has been pushed to stable

notes:
Fix incorrect scriptlets of chkconfig.
2013.62 - Tuesday 3 December 2013

- Disable "interactive" QoS connection options when a connection doesn't
  have a PTY (eg scp, rsync). Thanks to Catalin Patulea for the patch.

- Log when a hostkey is generated with -R, fix some bugs in handling server
  hostkey commandline options

- Fix crash in Dropbearconvert and 521 bit key, reported by NiLuJe

- Update config.guess and config.sub again

2013.61test - Thursday 14 November 2013

- ECC (elliptic curve) support. Supports ECDSA hostkeys (requires new keys to
  be generated) and ECDH for setting up encryption keys (no intervention
  required). This is significantly faster.

- curve25519-sha256@libssh.org support for setting up encryption keys. This is
  another elliptic curve mode with less potential of NSA interference in
  algorithm parameters. curve25519-donna code thanks to Adam Langley

- -R option to automatically generate hostkeys. This is recommended for
  embedded platforms since it allows the system random number device
  /dev/urandom a longer startup time to generate a secure seed before the
  hostkey is required.

- Compile fixes for old vendor compilers like Tru64 from Daniel Richard G.

- Make authorized_keys handling more robust, don't exit encountering
  malformed lines. Thanks to Lorin Hochstein and Mark Stillwell 

2013.60 - Wednesday 16 October 2013

- Fix "make install" so that it doesn't always install to /bin and /sbin

- Fix "make install MULTI=1", installing manpages failed

- Fix "make install" when scp is included since it has no manpage

- Make --disable-bundled-libtom work
title: dropbear-2013.62-2.el6
